name: Mutation: Bottle Doom
description: Mutation: Bottle Doom is an action-adventure game. It takes an action for the player to make its goal by shooting the infected person using a vaccine. It takes a lot of adventures for the player at each level and stages such as new environments, types of infected persons, upgraded equipment and other things that can be equipped by the player.  The story starts when the scientist failed his experiment which caused the pandemic. The survivor named Kael was recruited and assigned to heal all of the infected people.
